name: B.D.S.M - Building Demolition Services Management
description:
Whelp, it happened, that cyberpunk ultra-capitalist hellscape we all dread and fear, it's here.  

Things move fast around here, most major building investments last only about 10 seconds (Not the only thing that lasts 10 seconds :P ).  So I know what you're wondering, how do I make money here?  You manage a demolition service that fulfills land purchase requests, basically an over glorified real-estate agent.  You're on the clock and each mistake means getting fined. You've got a lot of buildings to blow up. Let's just hope that there's no one in there, not again at least...

AND BEFORE YOU PLAY, why did you click on this exactly?  Sick fuck....

HOW TO PLAY:

Your job is to buy land for construction.  To buy land, you need to own it, and it needs to be empty. If you buy a plot of land, a new building will appear.  Re-purchase the land and building to destroy it and make profit from new orders.

GETTING STARTED :
  • First Step, wait for the order.  After it comes through, find out which land to buy (look at the tip section for more help)
  • Next Off, buy land.  Owned land will be indicated by a floating green arrow, then click the order and a building will be placed.
  • Eventually, you'll run out of space so it's a good idea to start evicting early 
  • Don't Go Bankrupt, or do I guess, up to you
EVICTION :

You have two options to force people from there homes.  They vary in prices and speed.

  1.  (Dynamite Icon) This option requires and empty building, to empty a building, click the dynamite icon and safely get rid of the building.
  2.  (Bomb Icon ) If you're running out of space and orders penalties are eating away at your bank account, it's time to kill innocents.  Use the bomb icon to instantly rid yourself of the building and its inhabitants.  
TIPS :
  • Orders are tied to districts, districts aren't visual you just kinda have to get the feel for it.  The districts include | The Outskirts | The Center | Main Street
  • Hovering over and order will tell you where to place it, along with the penalty for the death of any residents
  • If you hate us and our game, press ESC - to exit the game, but you wouldn't do that now would you :)
